reviews.review_msg: Avoid this course! Quizzes worth 30% of your grade and are based on the tiniest details of lengthy chapter each week. You would expect the main themes of the chapter to be quizzes but nope! You mess up on the quizzes and your grade is done. Midterm so confusing - need tiniest details to be remembered and applied. Don't recommend save ur GPA

Engaging lectures. Relies on the TM for marking and discussions (we had a great one, so that worked out well enough, a great opportunity for them too). A lot of workreading but worth it if you are interested in learning the material. I have taken him before and his knowledge and humor always makes for an interesting class.
